facts.0: In 2018, of the 83,517 liver disease deaths among individuals ages 12 and older, 47.8 percent involved alcohol.
facts.1: Fatty liver condition is present in approximately 90 to 100 percent of heavy drinkers.
facts.2: Alcohol remains the second most common cause of liver cirrhosis after hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection in the United States, contributing to approximately 20% to 25% cases of liver cirrhosis.
